item.description:
The times, the seasons, the Stock Market... they all seem to change rapidly, but how about you & your clients? How are all of you doing, at keeping pace?

 

On Thursday, June 9th,we'll be joined by Access Consciousness' Douglas Turet, BF, for an in-formative look at Access'  intriguingly efficient, multi-modal approach to personal change – a 22 year-old system which is currently used by thousands of practitioners, in more than 25 countries! 

Before you head home, you'll have heard & witnessed (and who knows – maybe even personally experienced?) a little of what Access Consciousness' myriad tools and processes can offer for your and your clients' development!  ...And what if a few of those wound up making our lives easier ?

 

Specific Topic: Running of the Bars 

We have the honor of a guest presenter on this day.  Douglas Turet, a certified Access Bars Facilitator will be offering a presentation and Demonstration on Access Consciousness.

This is a relatively new healing/awakening modality in our area.  Speaking to people about his (and I have talked to people at the headquarters in CA), this sounds like a phenomenal experience.  From what I have heard, it sounds like massage. Reiki, and EFT combined.

Don't miss this very rare opportunity in Massachusetts to learn and experience this.

Reserve now before it fills up.  This meetup will be updated with more information as I get it from Doug.

Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be.

 

Kevin Martin
978-273-5905
kenda_assoc@msn.com
www.poseffects.com

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston NLP Meetup - Natick - Guest Presenter -Access Bars
